ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | mvrraddd.1 | |- ( ph -> B e. CC ) |
| 2 |  | mvrraddd.2 | |- ( ph -> C e. CC ) |
| 3 |  | mvrraddd.3 | |- ( ph -> A = ( B + C ) ) |
| 4 | 3 | #P_oveq1d | |- ( ph -> ( A - C ) = ( ( B + C ) - C ) ) |
| 5 | 1, 2 | #P_pncand | |- ( ph -> ( ( B + C ) - C ) = B ) |
| 6 | 4, 5 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( ph -> ( A - C ) = B ) |
